projects: [{"title":"Chargeback Management System","start_date":"Jan 2019","end_date":"Present","description":"The Chargeback Management System application is responsible for allowing Lowe‚Äôs internal business users to collect, modify and maintain all customer related information on any and all chargebacks raised during the course of day-to-day business. This ongoing project involves building a web application for Chargeback management from depreciated version using java 8(Spring Boot framework with jdk 1.8) and Angular 6 for frontend and deploying it on JBoss servers."},{"title":"Receipts Expansion","start_date":"Mar 2018","end_date":"Dec 2018","description":"The applications impacted by this project collectively assist in providing Customer Purchase Receipts and Customer Signature information to varied users, both internal and external, via a common REST web service and individual Angular 5 clients.
